data.title: Yuvika Chaudhary’s Biography | Birth | Education | Debut Film | Shows | Marriage
meta_keywords: Dada Saheb Phalke International Film Festival Award
data.meta_description: Yuvika Chaudhary is an Indian actress and model. Yuvika started her acting career in 2000 with a small role in the Bollywood film ‘Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani’. In 2022, Yuvika Chaudhary was awarded the ‘Dada Saheb Phalke International Film Festival Award’.
data.text:
Yuvika Chaudhary is an Indian actress and model. She was born on 2 August 1983 in Baraut, Uttar Pradesh. Her zodiac sign is Leo. She did her schooling from Laksh Public School, Baghpat, Uttar Pradesh.

Her father, Ram Naresh is a teacher. Her mother, Rajnish Singh is a homemaker. She has a brother, Akash Chaudhary, who is also an actor.

Yuvika is married to Prince Narula, who is an actor and a model.

Yuvika's favourites

Her hobbies include reading, dancing, travelling and singing.

She likes to eat Rajma Chawal, burgers and chocolates.

Her favourite actors are Amitabh Bachchan, Shah Rukh Khan, Madhuri Dixit and Anushka Sharma.

The film that she likes the most is ‘The Pursuit of Happyness’.

Her favourite travelling destination is Jammu and Kashmir.

Yuvika owns a BMW car.

Interesting facts about Yuvika

Yuvika started her acting career in 2000 with a small role in the Bollywood film ‘Phir Bhi Dil Hai Hindustani’. Shah Rukh Khan was the lead actor in the film.

Before Dia Mirza, she was selected for the role of ‘Simran’ in the blockbuster film ‘Lage Raho Munna Bhai (2006)’.

In the year 2007 she worked as a supporting actress in the super-hit film ‘Om Shanti Om’ alongside Deepika Padukone, Shahrukh Khan, Arjun Rampal and others. This was her first major film after which she received many acting offers.

Yuvika’s first lead role

In the year 2011, she got her first role as a lead actress in the film ‘Naughty @ 40’ opposite Govinda.

Her first Punjabi film ‘Daddy Cool Munde Phool (2013)’ was a big hit in her career.

Yuvika’s marriage

In 2015, she was a part of the famous reality show ‘Bigg Boss Season 9’. She met Prince Narula in the show for the first time. They became good friends and soon their relationship bloomed into love.

On 12 October 2018, Yuvika and Prince got married in the presence of their families.

Apart from being an actress, Yuvika Chaudhary is also a good singer.

In the year 2019, Yuvika won the dance reality show ‘Nach Baliye 9’ with her husband Prince Narula.

Yuvika Chaudhary is a trained Bharatanatyam dancer.

Yuvika’s shows and films

She has worked in shows like 'Astitva-Ek Prem Kahani', 'Dafa 420', 'Kumkum Bhagya', 'Bigg Boss 9' and 'Laal Ishq'.

She was seen in films like, To Baat Pakki, Yaarana, Afra-Tafri and Summer 2007.

Awards

In the year 2018, she was honoured with ‘Dadasaheb Phalke Award’ along with Prince Narula.

In 2022, Yuvika Chaudhary was awarded the ‘Dada Saheb Phalke International Film Festival Award’.
